paper_title: Calabi-Yau property of Quantum Groups of $GL(2)$ Representation Type
abstract: In this paper, we prove that the quantum groups $G(A,B)$ introduced by Mrozinski and their Hopf-Galois objects are twisted Calabi-Yau algebras, and give their Nakayama automorphisms explicitly.
publication_venue: to appear in J. Algebra its Appl
